Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.world

Class GameUpdater

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.world.GameUpdater
public class GameUpdater extends Object
This class is used to call different methods from ElementsRemover, ElementsUpdater , ElementsColliders to update the location of GameObject from the WorldElements.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
Author:
fy916
